bibl.title: Raymond Bogaert: Life and Work.

Koenraad VERBOVEN, Katelijn VANDORPE and Véronique CHANKOWSKI, Pistoi dia tèn technèn. Bankers, Loans and Archives in the Ancient World. Studies in Honour of Raymond Bogaert = Studia Hellenistica. 44 (Leuven, 2008) pp. x-xxiv, 1 portrait.
